title: Flora's farewel: or, The shepherds love passion song. Wherein he doth greatly complain because his love was spent in vain; To a delicate tune; or, A thousand times my love commend.
author: L. P. (Laurence Price), fl. 1625-1680?
publisher: Printed for A. Milbourn, W. Onley, and T. Thackeray, at the Angel in Duck-Lane,
